properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 31 at 1:20PM MST until February 1 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 45 mph
expected in valleys. Terrain above 6000 feet: southwest winds of
40 to 50 mph with gusts up 65 mph.

* WHERE...Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and
Polson.

* WHEN...From 1 PM to 11 PM MST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
Large waves could occur on area lakes.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 11 PM MST SATURDAY
